title: The Ultimate Change Your Life Guided Meditation
description: In this audio from the “The Ultimate” series, international best-selling mind power author Stephen Richards has developed one of the most powerful ways to help you to develop your ability to transform your future. The Ultimate Change Your Life Guided Meditation is an inner exploration that will guide you in mastering change and achieving your goals through an effortless guided meditation. When you can master change then you can achieve your goals.Whether we like it or not, everything around us and even inside us is constantly changing. Areas which affect everyone’s lives include health, money, work and relationships. Learning how you are affected by change will aid you in recreating yourself by transforming your future, reinventing your life and creating the life you want now.This audio purposefully steers away from use of hypnosis and subliminal messaging. Whether you are just learning to meditate or want to discover new methods to deepen your practice you will find yourself guided through the easy to follow steps to meditation practice that will change your way of thinking forever.
author: Stephen Richards
